roleset.name: have a bowel movement
roleset.note: DEFECATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'defecate' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 40.1.2-1. (from defecate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: unk
example.text: Bourgeois couples discuss defecation around a toilet - lined table but consider `` food '' an impolite topic , and so on .

example.name: Arg0
example.text: Several weeks since his surgery, the patient's defecation is no longer hampered.
